Reviews.Title: Size and VGA input make this suitable for some CNC monitor repairs
Reviews.Author: CT12F3
Reviews.Content: Size and VGA input make this suitable for some CNC monitor repairsThis monitor was used to replace a burned out monitor on a Milltronics Centurion 1 controller (finding an OEM or compatible CRT monitor for a 16 year old CNC controller can be daunting). The size 9.2" is fine, but I think the next size bigger would work even better (10.4" version).-better picture than the original CRT monitor-standard VGA plug-does not come with its own power supply - but a re-purposed old laptop 12v out power supply seems to power it without issues.-the power on button needed pressed the first time the monitor is powered up, after that the monitor auto starts with power application.-the first time the monitor was powered up nothing showed on the monitor. Pressing the "input select" once fixed that.-uses far less power and takes up way less cabinet room than the old monitor did.I like it.(If it dies soon - I will update review)

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: Nafty
Reviews.Content: Just hooked up the screen for my Frond door cam,I can say it is very good, and worth the money!Bigger size recommended, but i didn't have room, I can send u pics,just reply to post

Reviews.Title: power supply update
Reviews.Author: Nafty
Reviews.Content: Here is the power supply to be used with the moniter, http://www.amazon.com/review/r12u19iach4pbm,I have read other reviews saying that this power supply work well with the pyle screen, (note I did not make the video review. In that link)I hope I helped someone out!!!!

Reviews.Title: THIS ITEM DOESN'T MAKE SENSE
Reviews.Author: J. Jones
Reviews.Content: It says widescreen, it says 16:9 aspect ratioIt says... 640x480 resolution!?!But wait! 640x480 is a 4:3 resolution!Did some pixels get stretched?Perhaps it's 800x480.Either way the description is misleading so I don't even know if it's suitable for my application or not.

Reviews.Title: Useless in wall other than a second monitor or camera monitor. No touch screen!
Reviews.Author: Eric Broom
Reviews.Content: This is mostly useless in wall because it is a second monitor only. No touch screen features. Save your money and get an elo touchscreen device that you would want to mount in the wall.

Reviews.Title: monitor keeps blinking off
Reviews.Author: Patriot
Reviews.Content: Seems to be searching for other inputs even though vga input was displaying image from ez trak cnc.Image was good until it started blinking off and on.There should be a way to make input not search.

Reviews.Title: pleasantly suprised
Reviews.Author: Rachael Parker
Reviews.Content: focusing on the "product" only.Very satisfied. I would place this as an affordable flat screen with great picture and sound.Based on the product only, it is worth the money.The down side are the instructions, but I have decided to over look the foreign language they were written in, and recommend the monitor.The monitors so inexpensive and works so well, it's worth it in the end.

Reviews.Title: Flat panel monitor
Reviews.Author: RalphP
Reviews.Content: It has a great picture, and looks great once installed.The mount is built well, has a nice finished look with the added trim kit. Installation was relatively easy, i am no genius with electronics, didn't have that much trouble installing. Think it's worth the 125, nice flat panel.

ProductInfo.Features:
9.2'' TFT LCD Screen Wall Mount - Wireless Remote Control - BNC Connector - Dimensions: 9.84''W x 0.57''H x 1.10''D
PAL/NTSC Auto Color System - Brightness: 350 cd/m2 - For Use in Limousine/RV/Bus
16:9 Screen Aspect Ratio - Viewing Angle: 40 degrees Up/70 degrees Down/Left & Right 70 degrees - Wall Mounting Bracket Included
640 x 480 High Resolution - Video Input: RCA & VGA - Paintable Mounting Trim Included
300:1 Contrast Ratio - Power Supply: DC 12V - Clean and Professional Installation
ProductInfo.Name: Pyle Home PLVW9IW 9.2-Inch InWall Mount TFT LCD Flat Panel Monitor for Home and Mobile Use
